en: 57-Web home page (text, logo, image of a department)

Besides the EU Member States, from 2015 onwards, the following countries participate in the Creative Europe Programme: Norway, Iceland, Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina and Montenegro (full participation in the Culture and the MEDIA Sub-programmes) as well as the Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, the Republic of Serbia (full participation in the Culture sub-programme) and Turkey (full participation in the Culture Sub-programme and partial participation in the MEDIA Sub-programme, i.e. participation in training, festivals, audience development and market access activities).

Besides the EU Member States, from 2015 onwards, the following countries participate in the Creative Europe Programme: Norway, Iceland, Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina and Montenegro (full participation in the Culture and the MEDIA Sub-programmes) as well as the Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, the Republic of Serbia (full participation in the Culture sub-programme) and Turkey (full participation in the Culture Sub-programme and partial participation in the MEDIA Sub-programme, i.e. participation in training, festivals, audience development and market access activities).
